title: Version Mismatch for evm-m-extensions in mUSD  Acknowledged
content:
...

Export to GitHub ...

Set external GitHub Repo ...

Export to Clipboard (json)

Export to Clipboard (text)

#### Resolution

Deployment to mainnet addressed as per M0’s comment:

> We used commit hash [`50de1be2d971131c09a417cc5e359ad60de1b84b`](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions/compare/90f144deee35071e02b1ff0b62004b8d2435ddfe...50de1be2d971131c09a417cc5e359ad60de1b84b) when deploying to Mainnet.
>
> That being said, no change impacted mUSD between `90f144deee35071e02b1ff0b62004b8d2435ddfe` and `50de1be2d971131c09a417cc5e359ad60de1b84b` .

Note: The version of `evm-m-extensions` that is currently used in `mUSD` (where “currently” means precisely: in revision [b5594cd5c8a0b27534bf20f09ff08fd74bb18f7f](https://github.com/m0-foundation/mUSD/tree/b5594cd5c8a0b27534bf20f09ff08fd74bb18f7f), which is the final version we considered in this review - but not the version that was originally deployed) is [909c536deac54de5a5bc3305f57e310c327fb441](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions/tree/909c536deac54de5a5bc3305f57e310c327fb441) and, therefore, one commit ahead of [50de1be2d971131c09a417cc5e359ad60de1b84b](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions/tree/50de1be2d971131c09a417cc5e359ad60de1b84b).

#### Description

`MUSD` inherits extensively from contracts in the [`evm-m-extensions`](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions) repository. While this code itself was not in scope for this audit, we had to check some of it for compatibility with `MUSD` and were asked to consider revision [`011f84f0f6a701a9796fcac1ad29896c60b65344`](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions/tree/011f84f0f6a701a9796fcac1ad29896c60b65344) for this.

It should be noted, however, that the submodule that is actually used in the [`mUSD`](https://github.com/m0-foundation/mUSD/) repository is at revision [`90f144deee35071e02b1ff0b62004b8d2435ddfe`](https://github.com/m0-foundation/evm-m-extensions/tree/90f144deee35071e02b1ff0b62004b8d2435ddfe) and therefore behind the commit hash we were given.

#### Recommendation

Since the `evm-m-extensions` are not in scope for this audit, we cannot give a recommendation as to which version to use. From the limited perspective of this review, the revision that is currently utilized in `mUSD` at the relevant commit hash is behind the one we were told was going to be used for `mUSD`.
